description: This file defines a React functional component called TaskList that renders a list of tasks, including handling empty state. It imports another component called TaskItem and manages how tasks are displayed and interacted with.

methods.name: TaskList({ tasks, onToggle, onEdit, onDelete, isTaskMutating })
methods.description: React component that displays a list of tasks with header and count, or an empty state message if no tasks are provided.

ctags.name: TaskList
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TaskList({ tasks, onToggle, onEdit, onDelete, isTaskMutating }) {$/
